name: Shard of Echoes
power: Reveals ancient voices trapped in stone
description: A crystal fragment that sings with the whispers of long-dead heroes when held to the ear.

name: Foglord’s Ring
description: Forged in secret, this relic allows its bearer to move unseen among even the most watchful.

name: Warden’s Brand
description: Burns with quiet authority — those who betray its bond wear the mark until death.
